sentences.english: This is surely the most short-sighted policy you could imagine.
sentences.chinese: 这绝对是你可以想见的最目光短浅的政策。

sentences.english: We must not be short-sighted and ruin our progeny.
sentences.chinese: 现在不应当目光短浅，遗祸子孙。

sentences.english: For this short-sighted thinking projects and organizations eventually pay a hefty price.
sentences.chinese: 对此，目光短浅的项目和组织最终要付出重大代价。

sentences.english: If you never stare off into the distance, you’ll never get there.
sentences.chinese: 如果总是目光短浅，那么你永远都到不了远方。

sentences.english: Nobody could accuse Mr Khoja of being narrow-minded.
sentences.chinese: 没人能指责他目光短浅。

sentences.english: Everything in our culture tempts you into short-term thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我们文化里的任何东西都能让你目光短浅。

sentences.english: This shortsighted policy will level down university standards.
sentences.chinese: 这个目光短浅的政策会降低大学水平的。

sentences.english: This short-sighted policy led to fatal results.
sentences.chinese: 这个目光短浅的政策导致了致命的后果。

sentences.english: It's short-sighted to think you can optimize your Web site and leave it be.
sentences.chinese: 如果认为你优化完网站就听之任之，这是目光短浅的。

sentences.english: But this is short-sighted and would provide-at best-a short-term fix.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种方式目光短浅，并且可能会带来短期的困难。

definition: to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to fail to see the larger issue (idiom)/to fail to grasp the big picture
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
